short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies web pages and mutes annoying videos.  Click the Yellow 'S' to simplify a page. Click it again to undo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin simplifies web pages and mutes annoying videos to allow for easier viewing of articles.  Navigate to a page or article you would like to read and simply click the yellow 'S' to simplify a page. Click it again to undo.  Work in Progress!
